Name: Invader TD
About the game: Invader TD brings the classic tower defense experience to a side scrolling environment, manage your resources to strategically build your defenses and defend against enemy attacks while evolving to be able to conquer planet earth. You are in control of an alien race that aims to dominate planet Earth, but the human beings will not let that happen, use your skills to defend yourself from human attacks, building structures and evolving them. Build Towers Upgrade Towers Destroy the enemies Exciting battles Physics based Stylized pixel art 4 towers types 10+ enemies types Original soundtrack
